name: Plan G - Organic Mediterranean Muscle Builder

Breakfast.details: Organic Mediterranean Breakfast Bowl: 2 organic eggs (poached), 1/2 cup organic Greek yogurt, 1/4 cup organic hummus, 1/2 cup organic cherry tomatoes, 1/4 cup organic cucumber, 1/4 cup organic feta cheese, 2 slices organic whole grain bread, 1 tbsp organic olive oil
Breakfast.instructions: Arrange all ingredients in a bowl. Drizzle with olive oil. Serve with whole grain bread.

Mid-Morning Snack.details: Organic Protein-Packed Tzatziki: 1 cup organic Greek yogurt, 1/2 organic cucumber (grated), 1 clove organic garlic (minced), 1 tbsp organic olive oil, 1 scoop organic unflavored protein powder, organic vegetable sticks for dipping
Mid-Morning Snack.instructions: Mix yogurt, cucumber, garlic, olive oil, and protein powder. Serve with vegetable sticks.

Lunch.details: Organic Grilled Chicken Souvlaki Plate: 6 oz organic chicken breast (cubed and grilled), 1 cup cooked organic quinoa, 1 cup organic Greek salad (tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, olives, feta), 2 tbsp organic olive oil, 1 organic whole wheat pita
Lunch.instructions: Grill chicken. Serve with quinoa, Greek salad, and pita. Drizzle with olive oil.

Pre-Workout Snack.details: Organic Energy Mix: 1/4 cup organic almonds, 1/4 cup organic pistachios, 1/4 cup organic dried figs, 1/4 cup organic dried apricots

Post-Workout Snack.details: Organic Protein Smoothie: 1.5 scoops organic vanilla protein powder, 1 cup organic almond milk, 1 organic banana, 1 tbsp organic almond butter, 1 tbsp organic honey, 1/4 cup organic rolled oats

Dinner.details: Organic Baked Salmon with Quinoa Tabbouleh: 8 oz organic salmon fillet, 1 cup cooked organic quinoa, 1 cup organic parsley (chopped), 1/2 cup organic mint (chopped), 1/2 cup organic cherry tomatoes, 1/4 cup organic red onion, 2 tbsp organic olive oil, juice of 1 organic lemon
Dinner.instructions: Bake salmon. Mix quinoa with herbs, tomatoes, onion, olive oil, and lemon juice. Serve together.

Evening Snack.details: Organic Greek Yogurt Parfait: 1 cup organic Greek yogurt, 1/4 cup organic granola, 1 tbsp organic honey, 1/4 cup organic mixed berries
Evening Snack.instructions: Layer yogurt, granola, and berries. Drizzle with honey.
